content:
1. Why don't you want to change account name? The account name is just a name displayed on your phone. It will not display in the emails you send.

To change account name: Settings > tap the account you want to configure > General settings > Account name.

2. By the way, you can change the account colors so that you can distinguish them.

To change account color: Settings > tap the account you want to configure > General settings > Account color.
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content: This forum is about Thunderbird for Android, and Thunderbird for Android does not have address book. I think you should post your problem in Thunderbird Community Forum: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/thunderbird
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content: Tap three horizontal bars of different widths in the upper right corner of the message list. Then tap "Date" or "Arrival". Then your messages will be sorted in ascending (or descending) order. You can repeat the above steps to make your messages sorted in descending (or ascending) order.
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content: Here's a more permanent fix - especially for ascending/descending order: https://www.badpenguin.org/thunderbirds-default-sort/
